greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number A(n,k) of Dyck paths of semilength k*n and height n; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Antidiagonals n = 0..80, flattened
maple: b:= proc(x, y, k) option remember;
mathematica: b[x_, y_, k_]:=b[x, y, k]=If[x==0, 1, If[y>0, b[x - 1, y - 1, k], 0] + If[y<Min[x - 1, k], b[x - 1, y + 1, k], 0]]; A[n_, k_]:=A[n, k]=If[n==0, 1, b[2n*k, 0, n] - b[2n*k, 0, n - 1]]; Table[A[n, d - n], {d, 0, 12}, {n, 0, d}]//Flatten (* _Indranil Ghosh_, Jul 07 2017, after Maple code *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 06 2017
